sentences.sContent: LD: We think it is best to keep questions like these partially open, that there will never be an univocal answer.
sentences.sContent_eng: LD: We think it is best to keep questions like these partially open, that there will never be an univocal answer.
sentences.sCn: LD： 我们认为将问题保持部分开放的是最好的选择，对于它将不会有一个单一的含义。
